remarks: A disjoint collection yields disjoint indexed unions for disjoint index sets.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Mar-2015.) (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
disjiunOLD $p |- ( ( A. y E* x ( x e. A /\ y e. B ) /\ ( C C_ A /\ D C_ A /\ ( C i^i D ) = (/) ) ) -> ( U_ x e. C B i^i U_ x e. D B ) = (/) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B y $.
$d C x y $.
$d D x y $.
